markings: four seals at right edge; three seal along bottom edge; seven lines of undecifered text at left side of image with 3 seals; eleven lines of undecifered text in own field left of image
text: At first glance, this work lacks refinement and displays somewhat exhibitionist brushwork, but it is noteworthy because of the artist's creativity in handling rather traditional subject matter. Zhang manipulated the ink with great dexterity and spontaneity to create stimulating visual structures. The artist imbued his forms with exceptional vitality, which augments the visual tension between his relatively abstract natural images.
title: Bamboo in Snow
